Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI gives out answer at any moment or any given time where else we cant contact a teacher in the middle of the night which makes the difference in learning

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: feedback from the teacher was more trustworthy and felt quite truthful while sometimes advices from AI are questionable
